values.name: Pending
values.description: The validation is running and the outcome is not yet known.

values.name: Deferred
values.description: The validation is deferred to a different system. When it is deferred to a different system, that system can inspect the validationOutput to determine the outcome.

ProvisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

value.description: The Validation items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

validatorVersionId.description: The ARM resource Id of the validator version to use for validation.

changeStateId.description: The changeState is a new resource that encapsulates the change and tracks the change state. The changeStateId is the ARM resource id of the changeState resource.

validationParameters.description: The parameters used for validation. This property will be checked against the validationParameterSchema in the validator resource.

validationParameters.description: The parameters used for validation. This property will be checked against the validationParameterSchema in the validator resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

validationOutput.description: The output of the validation. This property will match the output schema in the validator version resource.

retryAfter.description: Time duration in ISO8601 format to retry after, when the outcome property is 'Pending'. For all other values, the retryAfter is not present. This is an indication to the client to 'PATCH' validation after the duration.

message.description: Optional message to provide descriptive information about the outcome of the validation.

validatorVersionId.description: The ARM resource Id of the validator version to use for validation.

changeStateId.description: The changeState is a new resource that encapsulates the change and tracks the change state. The changeStateId is the ARM resource id of the changeState resource.

validationOutput.description: The output of the validation. This property will match the output schema in the validator version resource.
